meanings.sent1: The corkiest material for a bulletin board is actual cork.
meanings.sent2: Her corkiest hat was made entirely of cork pieces.
meanings.sent3: The corkiest tree in the forest was mistaken for a giant cork bottle stopper.
meanings.sent4: The corkiest texture of the fabric reminded her of the softness of cork.
meanings.sent5: The corkiest smell of the wine brought back memories of a cork forest.

meanings.sent1: This is the corkiest cork I have ever seen!
meanings.sent2: The corkiest bottle in the collection was from a vintage wine.
meanings.sent3: The corkiest sound came from the cork popping off the bottle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the corkiest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The corkiest taste of the wine lingered on his palate.

meanings.sent1: The corkiest shoes she owned were surprisingly comfortable.
meanings.sent2: His corkiest invention was a floating device made of cork.
meanings.sent3: The corkiest behavior at the party was the guest who kept popping up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had the corkiest bounce, like a cork bobbing on water.
meanings.sent5: The corkiest touch of the material made it feel like floating on air.
